snippet: A new analysis attributed the increase to gentrification and to a healthier lifestyle.
abstract: Average lifespan in Manhattan rose nearly 13 years for men and more than 8 years for women since 1985; new analysis attributes the increase, which is the largest in any county in the nation, to gentrification and to a healthier lifestyle.
lead_paragraph: A new analysis attributed the increase to gentrification and to a healthier lifestyle.

headline.main: Prosper and Live Long: Health-Minded Manhattan Leads in Increased Life Span
headline.print_headline: Manhattan Leads in Increases in Life Span
